name: flicker (PapaCheech)
description:
You are blue, a spirit in the ethereal plane. You exist in one world. You exist in all worlds.

You are stalked by echoes of yourself through time and space.

Can you survive?

WASD or arrows to move.

The music, sounds, and gameplay all combine to make the experience complete, please play with speakers or headphones on.

for more games, visit my website.

Programming/Art: Dan Forstinger

Music: Bram Tebbut and Phil Hulse
